title: Why do I get punished for other people being D-bags?
body:
Normals queue, I call top first, everyone else agrees, random Kalista instalocks and goes top. 

I leave because I have better things to do than deal with children, yet I'm the one that gets punished for him being a D-Bag. Please explain.

replies.body: Because you're the one who dodged. You wasted the time of 9 other players just because you didn't get what you want.

> [{quoted}](name=A true Lucario,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9iXgJjzX,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-11-24T00:40:48.933+0000)
> Because you're the one who dodged. You wasted the time of 9 other players just because you didn't get what you want.

By your logic, so did he. Why couldn't HE have gone teambuilder if he didn't want to go by normals etiquette?

Hey Yisus,

the role / position calling in one of the area of friction in LOL and that's why we have created teambuilder. I'd recommend you playing that game mode if you really want to play a specific role.
When you enter blind pick, everyone should be aware that there is a good chance not to get his/her favourite role.

To be honest with you though, I don't think this is the real problem with you.
I checked your account and you have been reported many times by teammates and enemies for your language and attitude. If you start a game with bad attitude, there is a VERY HIGH chance any little thing will piss you off and you will end up in a spiral of negativity which then also reflects in the way you speak both ingame and outside the game.

As an example, the boards have been opened since couple of days and you have posted twice. Both time negatively ([here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/RMTRnikI-community-is-trash-as-fk-afk-and-trolls-every-game) the other post.

You have been temporarily banned and chat restricted several times already but it looks like it's not working...
If I were in you, I would take a break from LOL as you have invested a fair amount of time and money on this account and would be a shame to see it disappear...

Best
MM

> You have been temporarily banned and chat restricted several times already but it looks like it's not working...
>** If I were in you**, I would take a break from LOL as you have invested a fair amount of time and money on this account and would be a shame to see it disappear...

Oh Mirky, cheating on us again are we? Always the one to want to be in people... ;)

On a more serious note, that is sad to hear. Try out Teambuilder dude, it is actually surprisingly decent. I have only played it with friends, but we seem to have more enjoyable games that way as roles are chosen before we even go into queue. Takes the stress out of the time restrictions to choose roles.

And what happened to the trolls. Nothing, no? Didn't think so.

I get angry because i genuinely try SO HARD to win every ranked (and normal...) game, and when I get trolled, yes, I get mad. I play ranked to win, not to have people laugh/feed then AFK, of course I'm going to abuse them because any gains I worked SO HARD for in the previous game just get completely destroyed by some idiot who wants to troll.

If it were bronze, silver, who cares. THESE ARE DIAMOND GAMES, I EXPECT BETTER OF PEOPLE.

I never see ANY apprehension of their actions. What do? :(

edit: Last game, had top go 1/5, bot 2/7 and our jungle WW cried and AFK'd at 18 minutes, i was 3-2-2 and trying so hard to help the team win, but nothing, thresh just laughs in mid and lets opponents kill him.  DIAMOND. 

People lose lanes, I get that. %%%%, even I lose lanes, but I try my best to farm up and be useful still, not just keep walking into the opponents and laughing at my team.
And lets be honest here, everyone knows that the accepted etiquette for blind is 'first to call'. Always has been.

Whats my standing? I got a leavebuster warning for the first time a few days ago  after my sister had started downloading a 15gb update for her XBONE for her Halo:MCC which caused me to suffer ping greater than 800 for the whole match. I didnt leave but i did sit underneath fountain for the greater portion of the game as to not feed and give my team a better chance at wining.  What would you suggest to do when you have ping so high you cant effectively play? And no i had no warning prior to her starting the download so i couldnt tell if i was already lagging prior to loading screen.

P.s There was also a Malphite game i didnt connect to 14 days ago due to a Forced win8.1 update that screwed with my GPU and reverting my DirectX to something like DirectX10 which caused a connection issue when trying to load. Ive never intentionally afk'd despite having those games where your team just doesnt want to play nice.
